casebody.data:
No. 158,

Misc.

Gravis v. United States. Irwin L. Germaise, Bernard B. Polak and Eugene Gress-man. for petitioner. Solicitor General Cox, Assistant Attorney General Miller, Beatrice Rosenberg and Theodore George Gilinsky for the United States.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice White took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
